features: Degree’s UltraClear Black+White Pure Clean antiperspirant deodorant stick lasts for 72 hours and protects against white marks and yellow stains, making it one of Degree's best deodorants for women
This antiperspirant for women gives you a fresh and airy fragrance with a clean feel. With 72H non-stop protection, non-stop confidence, this is why it's one of Degree’s best smelling deo for women
Unique MotionSense technology that keeps you fresher the more you move. It’s filled with smart capsules that respond to motion. When you move, these capsules burst with fragrance
This antiperspirant for women is designed to be the best deodorant for any sport, fitness class or alternative forms of movement. This anti perspirant also protects against deodorant stains
Degree’s best deodorant for women is known to give you the ultimate freshness that’s activated when you move, however you move
body.description: Degree is upgrading to our best formula yet. Our new and improved formulation gives you 72 hours of nonstop sweat and odor protection. You will still find all the same fragrances you know and love, but now with our new and improved long lasting protection! For a limited time, you may still receive our old 48-hour formulation while all our new 72-hour products make their way to a store near you. Degree UltraClear Black+White antiperspirant deodorant in Pure Clean comes in a 2.6 oz deodorant. This will be your new favorite go to women's deodorant for everyday use. With no white marks on black clothes and no yellow stains on white clothes, you’ll look great and feel confident that you're protected from deodorant stains, sweat and body odor. Degree antiperspirant deodorant UltraClear Black+White has a breakthrough formula that cuts down on the stains that some other antiperspirants leave behind when they mix sweat and natural oils produced by your body. With a Pure Clean fragrance, expect a fresh and airy fragrance with a clean feel.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stay fresh with Degree Women UltraClear Black+White Antiperspirant Deodorant. This antiperspirant deodorant combats stains and provides 72-hour sweat and odor protection with a light, airy scent to leave you feeling fresh all day.

72-HOUR NONSTOP SWEAT PROTECTION This antiperspirant delivers unstoppable sweat and odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY Works in sync with your body to release bursts of fragrance, keeping you fresh all day. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD REUSED At Degree, we're committed to creating the most reuse and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we're making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Black+White Pure Rain Antiperspirant Deodorant Dry Spray 3.8 oz Degree Advanced Fresh Energy Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.6 oz Degree Advanced Shower Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick, 2.6 oz Main Benefit This antiperspirant deodorant is specially designed to keep your clothes looking new. It goes on instantly dry for a cleaner feel, and protects against sweat and body odor all day long. This deodorant contains Degree's innovatives MotionSense technology to keep you fresh with every move. This antiperspirant deodorant gives you superior protection from sweat and body odor all day long, so you can stay fresh and confident.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Getting expensive, but still works
reviews.reviewText: I prefer the fresh/clean scent of this to the pure rain which I liken to the blue room scent. Pretty gross.I like that this formula truly lasts all day. I'm a heavy equipment operator so I don't have an indoor, low stress, 9-5 by any means. I'm freezing cold, roasting hot, under pressure, & typically work long shifts both during the day & throughout the night. Degree keeps me smelling as fresh as I can from shower to shower & keeps me pretty dry. I won't say 100% I never get sweat marks, but this product seems to work the best for me & over the years I've tried many brands, including the clinical versions. I like this black & white formula because it seems to stain white tees a lot less than other brands & it doesn't make as much of a mess on colored clothing if I put it on before I get dressed, which I sometimes forget & do.Overall, I buy this one in bulk & make sure I have it on hand all the time both at home & in my rv because I live in that when I travel for work. It's a great formula too in that it doesn't give me a rash or make my skin break out. Previously with other brands, I've switched to unscented thinking that was the problem. I think others brands to me, are problematic to my skin. This scent & formula works well for me & hopefully it'll work well for you too :)

reviews.reviewText: Lasts all day, smells amazing, doesn't come off on my clothes, also works in other places just as well 😁 I'll never buy any other deodorant

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and works like a charm with zero staining!
reviews.reviewText: The product went on smooth with a very pleasant smell and worked great for my 12-hr shift at a medical facility. There wasn't any cakey residue on my scrubs, either! Highly recommend!
